data.title: Add a symlink to libgdiplus in the OS X package.
data.body: Closes #6413 for our packaged releases.

data.title: Fix crate collection issues
data.body: Fixes #5953, #6427, and does some code style cleanups.

data.title: Animated terrain tiles?
data.body:
Consider animating the tilesets and sprites to bring interesting environment effects, such as rippling water, swaying grass/trees, footprints/tracks in the snow or desert, etc.?

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/4276304-animated-terrain-tiles?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).

data.title: Replace the empty defaults in the LuaDocs with a nil default
data.body: Fixes #6078

data.title: Server crash
data.body: hetzner release have been down tonight. It's been suggested that a newly uploaded map yaml could have failed to parse, crashing the servers rather than rejecting the map. Could someone take a look just incase?

data.title: Restore legacy behaviour at game end for multi-player skirmish games
data.body:
Since it seems that the end-game dialog is generally not appreciated in the multiplayer community ([[1](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/6312)], [[2](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/6422)], [[3](http://logs.openra.net/?year=2014&month=08&day=25#02:31:05)), I think the best way forward is to disable it outright for multiplayer games.

It will still show for missions and single-player skirmishes, because I say so.

Reverts the bulk of #6397 as well, since the feature is out of place where it appears now.

Fixes #6422.

data.title: Changed landing craft unload anim ZOffset
data.body: Closes #6419.

data.title: Crash after crate landed on construction yard
data.body:
It was about to land next to a mcv which I then deployed into a construction yard.
DuplicateUnitCrateAction is assuming that the collector has Mobile, which clearly isn't always the case.

```

Runtime Version: .NET CLR 4.0.30319.34014

   at OpenRA.Mods.RA.Crates.DuplicateUnitCrateAction.<GetSuitableCells>d__a.MoveNext()
   at System.Linq.Enumerable.Any[TSource](IEnumerable`1 source)

   at System.Linq.Enumerable.WhereSelectEnumerableIterator`2.MoveNext()

   at OpenRA.World.Tick() in c:\Users\Scott\Code\OpenRA\OpenRA.Game\World.cs:line 278
   at OpenRA.Game.InnerLogicTick(OrderManager orderManager) in c:\Users\Scott\Code\OpenRA\OpenRA.Game\Game.cs:line 450
   at OpenRA.Game.LogicTick() in c:\Users\Scott\Code\OpenRA\OpenRA.Game\Game.cs:line 474
   at OpenRA.Game.Loop() in c:\Users\Scott\Code\OpenRA\OpenRA.Game\Game.cs:line 587
```

data.title: Fix a number or bugs wrt shroud/selection interaction in observer mode
data.body: Fixes #6421

data.title: Mission follow-up
data.body: Adds requested changes to/fixes issues with PRs #6324, #6325, #6327, #6328 (see comments)

data.title: Re-enable panning and chatting after game ends
data.body:
Also removes all of the pretty, since it conflicts with the chat box :/

Fixes #6422.

data.title: LuaDocs/Desc attributes spelling fixes
data.body: I have gone through the Desc attributes used during the LuaDocs generation and made some spelling, punctuation, and consistency fixes. If desired I would not mind going through the other Desc attributes as well.

data.body: i have only access to statistics or to leave the battlefield ...

data.title: Turrets are rendered on top of the landing craft during unload
data.body: Reproducible on the desert shellmap.

data.title: Cleaned up Dune 2000 infantry sequences
data.body: Followup of https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/6331. This does not fix anything, but does a further cleanup to make things easier to fix in the future.

data.title: Revert "fix infantry without idle anim staying in fire animation state"
data.body: Reverts part of #6331. Fixes #6416. Reopens #5884.

data.title: Idle infantry animation playback bug
data.body:
Reproducible in RA by telling infantry to stop/giving them no orders. This is also visible on the RA shellmap.
Probably introduced by #6331.

data.title: TD construction yard isn't sellable
data.body: The sell cursor will appear and it'll look as if you can sell it, but nothing happens when you click on a construction yard.

data.title: Some RA balance work
data.body: These are meant to address some balance problems with recent developments like the new plane repulsion, phase transport and the too-dominant yak and hind.

data.title: Terrain Tunnels
data.body:
To add a third dimension to the map, include a terrain implementation that allows units to go under map tiles (natural bridges, caves, etc.) Probably use a value that tracks how high a tile is, and where a unit is?

In lieu of #6357, It would be cool to have these just as easily destroyed, but suppose a nuke or chronoshift was used; how will the engine know if it wants to teleport/destroy the tiles inside or out?

data.title: GLA Tunnel Effect
data.body:
Ticket #2175 referred to an ability to make a cloaking device. Later in the comment thread, someone mentioned making a structure that works like the GLA tunnel network from C&C Generals.

I haven't seen a specific ticket on this like the comments suggested, so this is to bring the idea up for review.

A structure that can garrison troops and deploy at any other similar structure in the map. If they're all destroyed, the units inside die off. If it's possible to make individual units exit is good; otherwise it can function like APCs and discharge all the units in the network.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/4219842-gla-tunnel-effect?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>
